tr_sharedMinistry: Shared in any form of ministry during this month
tr_addRecordDesc: You don’t have any daily service records yet. Add them here to fill out your monthly report.
tr_extraTimeDesc: के तपाईं यो समयलाई अर्को महिनामा सार्न चाहनुहुन्छ?
tr_applicationAPSDesc: यहोवाप्रतिको मेरो प्रेम अनि उहाँ र उहाँको मायालु उद्देश्यको बारेमा अरूलाई सिकाउने मेरो चाहनाको कारण तल उल्लिखित समयमा सहायक अग्रगामी सेवा गरेर क्षेत्र सेवामा म आफ्नो सहभागिता बढाउन चाहन्छु:
tr_continuousAPS: अर्को जानकारी नदिएसम्म म सहायक अग्रगामीको रूपमा निरन्तर सेवा गरिरहन चाहन्छु।
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: I am of good moral standing and habits. I have made plans that will enable me to meet the hour requirement.—See the June 2013 Our Kingdom Ministry, p. 2.
tr_noteAPSApplication: ध्यान दिनुहोस्: सम्भव छ भने तपाईंले सहायक अग्रगामी सेवा सुरु गर्न चाहनुभएको समयभन्दा कम्तीमा एक हप्ताअघि नै यो आवेदन भरेर एल्डरहरूको निकायको संयोजकलाई दिनुहोस्। यो आवेदन शाखा कार्यालयमा पठाइँदैन। बरु, मण्डलीको फाइलमा राखिन्छ।
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
मण्डली सेवा समिति ध्यान दिनुपर्ने कुरा:

१. के आवेदकले राम्रो आचरण देखाउँदै उदाहरणीय ख्रिष्टियन जीवन बिताइरहेका छन्?

२. अघिल्लो वर्ष मात्र न्यायिक सुधार पाएको वा पुनर्बहाली भएको व्यक्ति अथवा अझै पनि प्रतिबन्धमा रहेको व्यक्ति योग्य हुँदैन।

३. के तपाईंले सम्बन्धित समूह निरीक्षकको राय बुझिसक्नुभयो?
tr_moreInformationForAP: Interested in becoming a full-time pioneer? Apply at hub.jw.org or contact the elders in your congregation.
tr_hourGoal: लक्षित समय ३० घण्टा सेट गरिएको छ
tr_hourGoalDesc: निरन्तर सेवा गरिरहन लक्ष्य ३० घण्टा हुनुपर्छ। तर मण्डलीमा घोषणा गरिएका निश्चित महिनाहरूमा तपाईंले १५ घण्टाको सेवा पनि गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: तपाईंको मण्डलीको सेवा समितिले यसलाई पुनरावलोकन गर्नेछन्। सदर गरिएमा तपाईंलाई जानकारी दिइनेछ।
tr_partnerNeededDesc: अरू प्रकाशकले सूची हेर्न र तपाईंसित साथी मिलाउन सक्नेछन्
tr_havePartnerDesc: सूचीबाट साथी छान्नुहोस् वा नाम टाइप गर्नुहोस्
tr_addToCalendarDesc: Do you want to add this event to your personal calendar? You should have a calendar app installed on your device.
tr_deletePWLocationDesc: Deleting this location permanently removes all its data and arrangements. This action cannot be undone.
tr_cantDeductStudiesDesc: You can’t select fewer studies than you already have selected in the “Individual Bible studies” menu.
tr_includesServiceAndCredit: Includes field service and credit hours
tr_noDailyRecordsDesc: No daily service records yet. Add the record to include it in your monthly report.
tr_reportPageInfo: On this page, you can view reports from publishers and add reports from those who do not use Organized. Select a publisher to start.
tr_alreadySubmittedWarning: This month’s report has already been submitted to the Branch Office. Only late reports can be added, unless you undo the submission.
tr_submitReportDesc: Submit the report for this month to your elders?
tr_noDailyRecordsMonthClosed: No daily service records for this month.
tr_undoSubmissionDesc: Are you sure to undo the submission of this report? Please note that this will also remove the report already sent to the secretary.
tr_undoSubmissionDone: Please make any necessary adjustments to this report and submit it again as soon as possible
tr_specialMonthsDesc: List of months where auxiliary pioneers can report 15 hours
tr_bibleStudiesNotice: Report one study per student each month
tr_hoursCreditPresetAddedInfo: The chosen credit hours preset will appear in the monthly report's comment field. Edit it there if needed.
tr_S10ReportNotGenerated: This year’s report hasn’t been generated yet. Generate it to see all the details and then submit.
tr_quickAssignAPDesc: This publisher is assigned as an auxiliary pioneer this month. You can change this on the publisher's enrollments list on the Persons page.
tr_S21CardTitleDesc: Select ‘All records’ to export and sort all records for publishers, full-time, and auxiliary servants, or ‘Specific records’ to export records only for selected publishers.
tr_S21ExportMultipleDesc: Select the publishers you want to include in the exported records. Each publisher will have a separate file.
